description:
The MC2000 Software includes the necessary drivers to control the MC2000 and is compatible with the latest version of the MC2000 firmware.

The software package includes the necessary drivers to control the MC2000 and is compatible with the latest version of the MC2000 firmware. The MC2000 hardware has been revised several times, and each revision requires different firmware versions. All units from hardware series 1.0 and 2.0 are out of warranty, and are no longer compatible with the latest firmware.
